title: Head measurements of football players
description:
Description
Data collected as part of a preliminary study examining the relation between
football helmet design and neck injuries. There are 30 subjects in each of
three groups: High school football players, college players and non-football
players.
reference:
Rencher, A. C. (1995), Methods of Multivariate Analysis, New
York: Wiley, Table 8.3.
usage: A data frame with 90 observations on the following 7 variables.

parameters.eye.top: a numeric vector: eye to top of head
parameters.group: a factor with levels High school College Non-football
parameters.width: a numeric vector: head width at widest dimension
parameters.ear.top: a numeric vector:ear to top of head
parameters.front.back: a numeric vector: front to back distance at eye level
